snippet: “Our vision is millions of people living and working in space, and New Glenn is a very important step,” said Jeffrey P. Bezos, the billionaire founder of Amazon and Blue Origin....
abstract: Jeffrey P Bezos's secretive space company Blue Origin offers look at its newest rocket design, created as part of company's mission to facilitate frequent and less expensive space travel; rockets, named New Glenn after John Glenn, are planned to be launched within several years.
lead_paragraph: “Our vision is millions of people living and working in space, and New Glenn is a very important step,” said Jeffrey P. Bezos, the billionaire founder of Amazon and Blue Origin.

headline.main: Meet New Glenn, the Blue Origin Rocket That May Someday Take You to Space
headline.print_headline: Introducing New Glenn: The Rocket  That May Someday Take You to Space
